mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file (file_original_name, file_new_name, file_path, file_size, file_date) VALUES (#{fileOriginalName}, #{fileNewName}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT f.file_no, f.file_original_name, f.file_new_name, f.file_path, f.file_size, f.file_date FROM file AS f LEFT JOIN file_relation AS r ON f.file_no = r.file_no WHERE f.file_no = #{fileNo}
